title: Barrels - Installation

body.body: Thoroughly clean the mating surfaces of the crankcase and barrels taking care not to damage the mating surfaces.
Fit a new base gasket and refit the locating dowels as noted during removal.
Using suitable spacers to support the pistons whilst preventing contact with the crankcase, rotate the crankshaft to position the pistons level with each other.

body.name: Barrels - Piston Installation ciyu D Series

body.body: Do not allow the pistons to fall against the crankcase when turning the engine. Piston and/or crankcase damage could occur if the pistons are not supported while turning the engine.
Ensure the piston ring end gaps are correctly positioned (see
Ensure the barrels and pistons are clean prior to installation.
Lubricate the piston rings and the cylinder bores with clean engine oil.
Do not allow the full weight of the barrels to rest unsupported on the pistons. Failure to support the barrels is likely to result in piston ring breakage.

Do not force the pistons into their bores. The base of each bore is chamfered to ease installation and excess force should not be needed. If either piston jams, lift the barrels slightly and check the rings are correctly located into their grooves before continuing. The use of force is likely to result in piston ring breakage.
With the aid of an assistant, ease the barrels carefully over the pistons whilst guiding the piston rings into the base of the cylinder bores.

body.name: Barrels - Piston Installation ciyv D Series

body.body: Slide the barrels fully down, remove the spacers and locate on the dowels.
Recheck the tensioner plunger location against the camshaft drive chain tensioner blade.
Alternator Cover install DV; DVY; DW4; DX4; DWB; DVB
